name: Doodle Blast!!!
description:
Color whatever you want! Smash and get your own 3D masterpiece!

Paint the split part and put them together to get more fun.

-Throwing and blasting feel sooooo right!
-We have every color to match your thoughts.
-Use cool patterns to custom various items.
-Smash to release stress and be a crazy happy guy!

Doodle Community grand opening!
Wanna know how other Doodlers blast their models?
Wanna see how many likes you collect around the world?
Ready to show off your artworks！
Update NOW and enjoy the exciting Doodle Community!
